price: para que invites [a creer en] Dios con Su anuencia; eres una antorcha luminosa.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
